verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> concerning יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> concerning פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> against the Philistines בְּטֶ֛רֶם <WH2962> before יַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> smote פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> before that Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> עַזָּֽה׃ <WH5804> Gaza ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold מַ֜יִם <WH4325> Behold waters עֹלִ֤ים <WH5927> rise up מִצָּפוֹן֙ <WH6828> out of the north וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> and become לְנַ֣חַל <WH5158> flood שׁוֹטֵ֔ף <WH7857> and shall be an overflowing וְיִשְׁטְפוּ֙ <WH7857> and shall overflow אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land וּמְלוֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> and all that is therein עִ֖יר <WH5892> the city וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and them that dwell בָ֑הּ וְזָֽעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> shall cry הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> therein then the men וְהֵילִ֕ל <WH3213> shall howl כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and every יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> and all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

מִקּ֗וֹל <WH6963> At the noise שַֽׁעֲטַת֙ <WH8161> of the stamping פַּרְס֣וֹת <WH6541> of the hoofs אַבִּירָ֔יו <WH47> of his strong מֵרַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> [horses] at the rushing לְרִכְבּ֔וֹ <WH7393> of his chariots הֲמ֖וֹן <WH1995> [and at] the rumbling גַּלְגִּלָּ֑יו <WH1534> of his wheels לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not הִפְנ֤וּ <WH6437> shall not look back אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> the fathers אֶל־ <WH413> about בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> to [their] children מֵֽרִפְי֖וֹן <WH7510> for feebleness יָדָֽיִם׃ <WH3027> of hands

עַל־ <WH5921> account הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> Because of the day הַבָּא֙ <WH935> that cometh לִשְׁד֣וֹד <WH7703> to spoil אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> all the Philistines לְהַכְרִ֤ית <WH3772> [and] to cut off לְצֹר֙ <WH6865> from Tyrus וּלְצִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> and Zidon כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> Every שָׂרִ֣יד <WH8300> that remaineth עֹזֵ֑ר <WH5826> every helper כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is going שֹׁדֵ֤ד <WH7703> will spoil יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> the remnant אִ֥י <WH339> of the country כַפְתּֽוֹר׃ <WH3731> of Caphtor

בָּ֤אָה <WH935> is come קָרְחָה֙ <WH7144> Baldness אֶל־ <WH413> upon עַזָּ֔ה <WH5804> upon Gaza נִדְמְתָ֥ה <WH1820> is cut off אַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <WH831> Ashkelon שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> [with] the remnant עִמְקָ֑ם <WH6010> of their valley עַד־ <WH5704> long מָתַ֖י <WH4970> How תִּתְגּוֹדָֽדִי׃ <WH1413> how long wilt thou cut ס

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> O חֶ֚רֶב <WH2719> thou sword לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֖נָה <WH575> How לֹ֣א <WH3808> how long [will it be] ere תִשְׁקֹ֑טִי <WH8252> thou be quiet הֵאָֽסְפִי֙ <WH622> ? put up אַל־ <WH413> into תַּעְרֵ֔ךְ <WH8593> thyself into thy scabbard הֵרָגְעִ֖י <WH7280> rest וָדֹֽמִּי׃ <WH1826> and be still

אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> How תִּשְׁקֹ֔טִי <WH8252> How can it be quiet וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> seeing the LORD צִוָּה־ <WH6680> hath given it a charge לָ֑הּ אֶֽל־ <WH413> and against אַשְׁקְל֛וֹן <WH831> against Ashkelon וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against ח֥וֹף <WH2348> coast הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> and against the sea שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> in it יְעָדָֽהּ׃ <WH3259> has assigned ס
